widget_subtitle: How much fashion facilities in your part of the world pay their employees and to which big fashion brands they are affiliated with?
public_commitment_question: Public Commitment on Living Wage: Has this brand made a public commitment to pay all workers in its supply chain a living wage sufficient to support themselves and their dependents?
